typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as integer,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
CasesAndDeathsSource filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterEuropeOnly
FilterEuropeOnly select(mapColumn(
		src_country = country,
		src_country_code = country_code,
		src_population = population,
		src_indicator = indicator,
		src_daily_count = daily_count,
		src_reported_date = date,
		src_source = source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredFields
SelectRequiredFields pivot(groupBy(src_country,
		src_population,
		src_source,
		src_reported_date),
	pivotBy(src_indicator, ['confirmed cases', 'deaths']),
	src_count = sum(src_daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotCounts
